news.title: Telangana: 80 master plans for UDAs, ULBs
news.para: The new master plans will have provision for outer ring roads (ORRs), mixed land use and link roads. Officials said the master plans are necessitated as the government has created 70 new municipalities.

news.title: Soon, portal for complaints against realty fraudsters in Punjab
news.para: Bhagwant Mann gave his nod for launch of a portal to monitor complaints pertaining to plots and apartments where sale deeds have been executed by developers, but possession is still awaited.

news.title: Lease income from 'residential' property is exempt from GST: AAR Maharashtra
news.para: In cities like Mumbai, residential flats are often let out, on a lease and license basis to business entities. In turn, the concerned company allots these flats to its key executives for their residential purposes.

news.title: ED attaches over 200 plots, flats in three states in ponzi-linked money laundering case
news.para: The assets are worth Rs 110 crore in total and are held in the name of Maithri Plantation and Horticulture Pvt Ltd (MPHPL), its sister concerns Sree Nakshatra Builders and Developers India Pvt Ltd (SNBDIPL), Maithri Realtors India Pvt. Ltd (MRIPL) and their directors Lakku Konda Reddy, Lakku Malayadri Reddy, Lakku Madhava Reddy and Kolikalapudi Brahma Reddy, it said.

news.title: ED seizes assets of Gupta Builders and Promoters in money laundering case
news.para: The money laundering case stems from a Punjab Police FIR against the accused who are alleged to have "duped and cheated" homebuyers/investors by neither delivering flats, plots, commercial units nor returning their monies to the tune of Rs 325 crore in connivance with various other persons.

news.title: Punjab CM approves new township in Mohali
news.para: The decision was taken in a meeting with officials of the urban development department. Mann said there is a need for a township to provide affordable housing facilities to people in the Tricity.

news.title: Chandigarh housing board's need based changes panel may give report today
news.para: In March, the adviser had asked panel members to submit the report, including recommendations, before the next board meeting of the CHB.

news.title: Ghaziabad civic body to take call on house tax hike on June 7
news.para: On Monday, municipal commissioner Mahendra Singh Tanwar said the house tax rate under the GMC was possibly one of the lowest in the state.

news.title: Rupee depreciation, reforms, returns pull NRIs towards Indian real estate
news.para: The rising interest from NRI homebuyers is being witnessed across segments, from mid-income projects to premium and luxury segments and plotted developments.

news.title: Mortgage market to double in five years: Deepak Parekh, chairman, HDFC
news.para: In his letter to shareholders, the corporation’s chairman called for shareholders’ patience as HDFC navigates through the complexities of the merger with HDFC Bank.

news.title: Prop-tech startup Ivy Homes raises $7 million in funding
news.para: The round saw participation form leading investors, including Khosla Ventures, Venture Highway, Y Combinator, GFC, Foundamental, Better Capital and Titan Capital.

news.title: RBI comes out with provisioning norms for large NBFCs
news.para: In case of individual housing loans and loans to Small and Micro Enterprises (SMEs), the rate of provision has been specified at 0.25 per cent and for housing loans extended at teaser rates, it has been fixed at 2 per cent.

news.title: Max Estates to acquire Accord Hotel & Resorts for Rs 306 crore
news.para: Accord Hotels and Resorts holds a fully paid up 10-acre land parcel located in Sector 128, Noida. This acquisition will enable Max Estates to develop a mixed-use residential project, which will have an estimated saleable area of around 1 million square feet.

news.title: Uttar Pradesh RERA orders inspection of Ajnara's Le Garden project
news.para: ​A controversy erupted after a RERA report on real estate developer Ajnara's Le Garden project showed that 100 per cent of the work has been completed on its club, swimming pools, among other works.

news.title: NCLT dismisses Wave Megacity Centre's plea to initiate insolvency against itself
news.para: Wave Megacity Centre Ltd, which is developing commercial and residential projects in sectors 25A and 32 of Noida, Uttar Pradesh, said it will evaluate the NCLT order and decide the next course of action.
